trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the **RowUpdating** event of a .NET Framework data provider.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os dados para o **RowUpdating** eventos de um fornecedor de dados .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: The `RowUpdating` event is typically raised just before an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row begins.
trans-unit.target: O `RowUpdating` evento normalmente é desencadeado imediatamente antes um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>para uma linha começa.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> para execução ao <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>é chamado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de instrução de SQL para executar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> enviar através de um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> object for an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> objeto para uma instância desta classe.

trans-unit.source: This method allows implementations to perform type checking for the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object assignment.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite que as implementações efetuar a verificar a existência de tipo de <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>atribuição de objetos.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: Only valid <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> objects, for example a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object, should be permitted.
trans-unit.target: Só é válido <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>objetos, por exemplo um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto, devem ser autorizadas.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> executar durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> para execução durante o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>operação.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> executar durante <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> executes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém erros gerados pelo fornecedor de dados .NET Framework quando o <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>executa.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> executes.
trans-unit.target: Os erros gerados pelo fornecedor de dados .NET Framework quando o <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>executa.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> that will be sent to the server as part of an insert, update, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> que será enviado para o servidor como parte de um insert, update ou operação de eliminação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to send through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> enviar através de um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de instrução de SQL para executar.

trans-unit.source: StatementType can be one of the following values: - Select - Insert - Update - Delete
trans-unit.target: StatementType pode ser um dos seguintes valores: - selecione - Insert - Update - Delete

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de instrução de SQL para executar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> of the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"> </xref> do <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> enviar através de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> enviar através de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>
